trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Altus
There were no other sightings in Altus on or around November 26th 2013
Summary: very bright light that is not a planet or star
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving back from Lawton and heading west i noticed a very very bright light in the sky to the south i would say about 10 to 10:30 in the sky,the time i seen it was approx. 6 pm just as it was getting dusk. it went down as the moon would from east to west. the next night my room mate came in and said there is a very bright thing in the sky. I told him about seeing it last night. we both do not think it is in space,seems to be in out atmosphere. I watch the sky's and have reported the things i see but no one wil come and let me show them. I doubt i get any response on this either
